Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'When the Demon King was finally defeated, everything around us turned blurry. I felt a force grabbed me and threw me away.'}
{3: 'When I realized, it was all dark around me. There was a light spot in the distance. It was where we fought moments ago.'}
{2: 'What just happened?', 3: '8', 4: "Where's everyone else?", 5: '10'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Goddess', 3: 'Just some preparation for the ending.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Don't worry, we are all fine.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Goddess', 3: 'Congratulations, heroes. You have cleared this game.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Are you the Goddess, or the Demon King?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Goddess', 3: "Of course I'm the Goddess. By the way, both the King and the Demon King are still alive.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "What? Still alive? Don't tell me we have to play one more time!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Goddess', 3: 'I said you cleared it. This run is over. Neither the King nor the Demon King could do anything anymore.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'So, is the world peaceful now?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Goddess', 3: 'Yes, the world is peaceful, until the next time it is restarted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The next restart?', 3: '27', 4: "Isn't the peace forever?", 5: '28'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: 'We have independent minds, but we are still a part of the game.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: 'If another hero enters the game and chooses to restart, the world will change accordingly. Another Demon King, or something else, will start wreaking havoc.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Are you saying all our efforts are wasted?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Goddess', 3: 'But we live by such "rules." Even if we keep repeating the same cycle, we are still living in this world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: 'Perhaps we cannot realize the changes to this world, but we are a part of the story, and we help the heroes to create the next cycle.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: 'That gives us a great sense of accomplishment.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Goddess referred to everything that took place in the game as "rules." She and everyone else all lived under such rules.'}
{3: "And they took pride from such life... If she hated it even a little bit, she wouldn't be smiling so brilliantly."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'But the world will plunge into chaos once again, just because a button is pressed! Can you really accept that?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Goddess', 3: 'Hmm, it probably will sound a bit strange, given that the Goddess is more like an "outsider" in the game.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: "But I'll still say this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: 'Why not?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Karenina was shocked by the Goddess' answer. She smiled again when she saw Karenina's stunned face."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Goddess', 3: 'Because I believe that you will still come to save this world next time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yes, of course.', 3: '49', 4: "I can't guarantee that...", 5: '50'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: "That's a deal.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: "Oh, I can ask other heroes then. I'm sure I will meet heroes like you again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: "Looks like we don't have much time left.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Time to say goodbye?', 3: '54'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: 'Yeah. The game has a safety feature that automatically kicks the players out after they have played a certain amount of time, or after the game is cleared.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Something grabbed my body, pulling me further away.'}
{3: 'The Goddess started talking again in the darkness.'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: 'I have met many heroes from the outside world. One of them told me that he would get nothing in return from saving the world in the game.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: 'No one was going to praise him. The items he obtained in the game could not make him stronger in the real world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: 'So I asked him, "Why do you still play this game so seriously?"', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Goddess', 3: '"Because this world needs a hero. Don\'t you think?"', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "What's cool about being a game nerd?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'This is supposed to be a touching moment... Do you really have to ruin it, Vera?', 4: '1'}
{3: "A list of credits quickly flashed across. Many of the entries were changed into Celica's own name."}
{3: 'We were commenting on the list, until we saw...'}
{3: '"I know a lot of things are still a mess... But thank you for playing this game."'}
{3: 'That was the last line I saw before leaving the game.'}
